adv.js: { //local effect if (isEditor) { if (mode === "sample") { const data = await sample(); for (const [k, v] of Object.entries(data)) { local[k] = v; } } else { const data = await load(); for (const [k, v] of Object.entries(data)) { local[k] = v; } } local.render(); } else { try { const data = await load(); const entries = Object.entries(data); if (entries.length === 0) { const data = await sample(); for (const [k, v] of Object.entries(data)) { local[k] = v; } } else { for (const [k, v] of entries) { local[k] = v; } } } catch (e) {} local._ready = true; local.render(); } }} > {children}
adv.jsBuilt: render(React.createElement("div",{...props},React.createElement(Local,{name:"data",value:{_ready:!1},effect:async e=>{if(isEditor){if(mode==="sample"){let a=await sample();for(let[s,t]of Object.entries(a))e[s]=t}else{let a=await load();for(let[s,t]of Object.entries(a))e[s]=t}e.render()}else{try{let a=await load(),s=Object.entries(a);if(s.length===0){let t=await sample();for(let[r,n]of Object.entries(t))e[r]=n}else for(let[t,r]of s)e[t]=r}catch{}e._ready=!0,e.render()}}},children)));

load.name: prop
load.valueBuilt: async()=>{let i=parseInt(params.id);isEditor&&(i=5);let t=await db.m_user.findFirst({where:{id:i},select:{id:!0,display_name:!0,code:!0,address:!0,date_of_birth:!0,id_semester:!0,picture:!0}}),a=await db.t_logbook.groupBy({by:["id_action"],where:{id_user:i},_count:{id_action:!0}}),o=await db.m_action.findMany({where:{id:{in:a.map(e=>e.id_action)}},select:{id:!0,name:!0}}),r={};for(let e of o)r[e.id]={id:e.id,label:e.name};for(let e of a)r[e.id_action].quantity=e._count.id_action;let s={id:t.id,Nama:t.display_name,NIM:t.code,Alamat:t.address,"Tanggal Lahir":moment(t.date_of_birth).format("DD MMM YYYY"),id_semester:t.id_semester,pic:t.picture},d=[];for(let[e,n]of Object.entries(s))e!=="pic"&&!e.includes("id")&&d.push({label:e,value:n});return{user:s,umap:d,log:Object.values(r)}};

sample.name: prop
sample.valueBuilt: async()=>({user:{Nama:"Dani Firmansyah",NIM:"DN",Alamat:"unair belok kiri","Tanggal Lahir":"20 Apr 2001",id_semester:1,pic:null},umap:[{label:"Nama",value:"Dani Firmansyah"},{label:"NIM",value:"DN"},{label:"Alamat",value:"unair belok kiri"},{label:"Tanggal Lahir",value:"20 Apr 2001"}],log:[{id:1,label:"Jaga",quantity:6},{id:2,label:"Kegiatan Ilmiah",quantity:2},{id:3,label:"Kegiatan Poli",quantity:1},{id:4,label:"Kegiatan Kamar Operasi",quantity:3},{id:5,label:"Seminar Hasil",quantity:2},{id:6,label:"Review Artikel",quantity:2},{id:7,label:"Proposal Thesis",quantity:2},{id:8,label:"Exam",quantity:2}]});
